content: pockets of joy square yarning stories by the yarny hobbit the yarn sometimes random chances in life lead us down unexpected paths via frost and some of these paths lead to beautiful encounters and friendships that enrich your life in equally unexpected ways such was my chance meeting with dedri petra shelley and susannah who before the chance meeting were crochet heroes to me admired from a distance while teaching knitting and crochet classes at my local yarn store in sydney morris and sons i interviewed the wonderful dedri we went to dinner and i got to meet everyone afterwards shelley via dedri actually dedri s sister proposed this beautiful idea to design crochet squares with the theme pockets of joy because that evening and indeed those few days turned out to be such pockets of joy for everyone here is my little fractal because yes i love math and physics pockets of joy contribution dedicated to all my wonderful friends here and the absolutely large-hearted crafting community where experts welcome novices with support friendship and the ever- expanding joy that balls of yarn and a crochet hook brings to our lives yarning stories bythe yarny hobbit 2 the pattern the pattern is written in us crochet terms as for the real yarn any yarn will do i used rowanlite cotton and stylecraft acryclic with a 4mm crochet hook for the samples shown in
